title: 820-3115 Water Damage Repair Power On Issues
message:
820-3115 Ultrasonic cleaned, system powers up fan on, hard drive attempts to spin up over and over in sync with the power light, the AC amperes goes from ~0.1A to 0.3A and swings in sync with the power light. New to macbook board repair and would really appreciate giving me a starting point.

Edit: I have schematic and board view.

title: 820-3115 Water Damage Repair Power On Issues
message: where was water damage????, Check for corrosion around ISL and SMC.....

title: 820-3115 Water Damage Repair Power On Issues
message: Here is a flir of the board running. The board is in a loop on off on off. [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f_zArZjWmNE[/url]

title: 820-3115 Water Damage Repair Power On Issues
message: Sorry I did not see any signs of actual damage. Customer just reported they spilled water on the keyboard and afterwards it did not function.

title: 820-3115 Water Damage Repair Power On Issues
message: Looks like the main area damaged was around U3890 the T29 15v Boost reg. ISL and SMC are clean

title: 820-3115 Water Damage Repair Power On Issues
message: Does the fan keep spinning or is it on/off?
